cu.explanation_en: Setting the transport preference to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper interface initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of downlink slots to an invalid value of 20 will exceed the maximum allowed slots for the TDD pattern and cause scheduling failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行時隙數設定為無效的值 20，將超過 TDD 模式允許的最大時隙數，並導致調度失敗。
